client_id.description: Unique identifier for the client associated with the project

client_name.description: Name of the client associated with the project

budget_is_monthly.description: Indicates if the budget is calculated on a monthly basis

budget_by.description: Person or entity responsible for the budget

is_active.description: Indicates if the project is currently active

budget.description: Total budget allocated for the project

budget_spent.description: Total amount spent from the budget

budget_remaining.description: Remaining budget amount available for the project

from.description: Start date of the budget period

to.description: End date of the budget period
